name: electric-terrain
flavor_text: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.
effect_text_extend:
For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes nature power to thunderbolt.
effect_text_simple: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.
